Chess Connect - Rapid

23rd February 2025 | 10:00 AM - 3:30 PM

Event Details:

Join us for our next chess meetup for a fantastic chess spirit!

Whether you’re a seasoned player or just discovering your love for the game, come embrace the thrill of chess, forge new connections, and make every move count.

Mark your calendar, bring your passion for chess, and get ready to create some remarkable memories with fellow chess enthusiasts. We can`t wait to see you at “Chess Connect”!

What’s Included:

  • 5 Hours of Rapid Chess (Format 10+5)
  • Special Prizes for the Top 3 Players
  • Chance to Win Premium Chess Sets from Paramount Chess through a Lucky Draw
  • Chance to Win a Chess.com Diamond Membership through Lucky Draw

Schedule

  • Registration and Player Briefing (10:00 AM)
  • Round 1 (10:20 AM)
  • Round 2 (11:00 AM)
  • Round 3 (11:40 AM)
  • Round 4 (12:15 PM)
  • Lunch Break (12:40 PM)
  • Round 5 (1:30 PM)
  • Round 6 (2:10 PM)
  • Round 7 (2:45 PM)

Game Variations:

  • Casual Standard Chess (Swiss Format): Immerse yourself in the world of traditional chess in an exhilarating Swiss Format tournament. Over 6-7 rounds, face opponents of similar skill levels, and enjoy the games with a mix of banter and a laid-back vibe. It's not just about winning, but about the shared love for the game and the camaraderie that makes every move memorable.

Looking to Upgrade your Chess Gear?

Enhance your chess experience with premium chess sets from Paramount Chess. Explore a variety of designs and styles to find the perfect fit for your game.

  • Visit: paramountchess.com
  • Email: paramountchess100@gmail.com
  • Call: 7043772271

Terms & Conditions

By participating in this event, you agree to the following terms:

  • Tickets: All tickets are non-refundable. Late arrivals may miss rounds, so please arrive at least 15 minutes early for check-in.
  • Venue Rules: Participants must follow venue policies on decorum and safety. The organizer is not responsible for lost or misplaced belongings.
  • Photography & Media: By attending, you consent to photos and videos taken during the event being used for promotional purposes by the organizer.

Contact Us: bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com | @bangalorechessclub

Event Location

The Market Place
RMZ EcoWorld 30-33, Bellandur, Bengaluru, India

View on Google Maps

Address

Bangalore, India bangalorechessclubofficial@gmail.com

Info

Bangalore Chess Club is the largest offline Chess Community in India where we aim to promote chess as a non competitive sport across ages and skill levels. Always striving to make chess fun.
